title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - July 20th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - July 20th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Chris Condon brings us the Fed Chair’s guide to managing President Trump-Brad Stone on how Amazon’s most ambitious research project is a convenience store-Shira Ovide describes why Uber should become the Amazon of routing-Chris Rovzar takes us behind the scenes at America’s most famous Sushi restaurant

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
